name: Bulb
description: Bulb is an independent, technology-led renewable energy company. We are no ordinary business so are looking for extraordinary people. You will be part of a passionate and growing team. This is an opportunity to get involved early in the life of a growth company.

name: nudj
description: Nudj is changing the way companies find and hire awesome people. This is an opportunity to join a small, but passionate team, who are on a mission to change hiring for good.

name: Moteefe
description: Moteefe is the perfect platform for designing and selling your own t-shirts, sweaters and tops. You design an items of clothing, Moteefe produces and delivers it, you get to keep all the profits

name: LoveCrafts
description: LoveCrafts' vision is to create an entirely new platform for the global maker community - one craft at a time. They launched their first site four years ago - early success led to funding from one of Europe's leading venture investors - and they haven't looked back since. With a global customer base, physical hubs in UK and US; and 3 x growth year on year, theyâ€™ve grown from start up to sensation in a short space of time.

name: Apidura
description: Built from a passion for adventure, cycling and the outdoors; Apidura is driving the evolution in ultra-light cycling and opening a new world of riding possibilities for passionate cyclists.

name: Venrex
description: Venrex is a early stage VC firm investing in start-ups and growth companies. Our existing portfolio includes: Just-Eat, Charlotte Tilbury, Notonthehighstreet, Lyst, Revolut and many others.
